name: Blocky: Tower Defense
description:
A tower defense game made completely out of rectangles.

Place towers and defend against powerful enemies.

Includes four towers and four enemies. Early Access.

Blue tower: $50. 2 damage, normal speed.

Yellow tower: $75. 1 damage, high speed.

Orange tower: $100. 5 damage, low speed.

Turquoise tower: $250. 5 damage, High speed.

Demo includes 2 towers, 2 enemies.
